text: Oh no!
Our sign has blown down in the storm!

The mechanicals can fix it, but how can we
get it back onto the roof?
I know!
Caroline the Crane!
She’s just the vehicle for the job!
Hello Caroline, good to see you.

Now that the wind has stopped, could you help
us get our sign back onto the roof?
Oh dear, that doesn’t sound good.

There must be something wrong with your winch
motor, Caroline.

Let’s get you inside so that the Mechanicals
can take a look at you!

Vehicle Turntable Spin Spin Spin
Let's make sad Caroline Grin Grin Grin
Go Go Mechanicals

Hmm, everything seems ok here, I think you
just need some oil.
We need someone who can reach!
Go Go Super Mechanical!

There, that oil should have freed everything
up.
Let’s test your winch

One Metre, Two Metres, Three Metres, Four
Metres, Five Metres!
Everything seems to be working fine now.
How high can you lift them, Caroline?
Uh Oh, I didn’t mean that high!
You’ve crashed right through the roof!

Before we get this sign back up, I think the
mechanicals had better get that hole fixed,

we don’t want any rain getting into the
garage!

Now that the mechanicals have fixed the hole,
Reattaching the sign is our new goal...

Caroline lifts it high off the ground,
So people can see it for miles around!”
Thank you for your help with the sign, Caroline

Uh Oh, now the hole is fixed and Caroline
has gone home, the Mechanicals are stuck up
on the roof!

Let’s hope they get down before the next
episode!!!
Byeeeeee!
